seo.title: Contact | SustainSage
seo.description: Book a calm, bilingual intro conversation with SustainSage. Share your context and we will respond with options, consent boundaries, and next steps.

hero.title: Contact & next steps
hero.subtitle: Tell us what you are navigating. Share as much or as little detail as you wish; a few honest lines are enough.
hero.note: We usually reply within a few UK working days and only use your information to arrange coaching conversations.
hero.imageAlt: Illustration of scheduling a coaching session

intro: You do not need a perfect story. Let us know what feels most pressing, and we will take it from there together.

highlights.title: Before you send your note
highlights.intro: A quick overview of what happens after you reach out.

items.title: 20-minute intro call
items.description: We offer a short, no-pressure conversation to check fit, scope, and boundaries before any commitment.

items.title: Calm, confidential handling
items.description: Your message is reviewed by an ICF coach. We only keep details needed for scheduling and delete anything else.

items.title: Honest recommendations
items.description: If coaching is not the right support, we will point you toward therapy, counselling, legal, immigration, or other services instead of selling.

form.title: Send us a note
form.subtitle: The more context you share, the more we can respect your pace and boundaries in the intro call.
form.name: Name
form.help: What would you like to talk about?
form.helpHint: Short headlines are enough — e.g. relocation anxiety, return to work, visa planning, burnout recovery.

focusAreaOptions.label: Returning to work after a break

form.focusHint: Selecting an area helps us match you with the right coach, but it is fine to stay undecided.
form.timezonePlaceholder: e.g. GMT+8 evenings, or UK lunchtime
form.consent: I consent to SustainSage contacting me about coaching. I understand my details are used only for this purpose and handled confidentially, with legal or safeguarding exceptions.
form.privacyNote: We store your information only to arrange coaching conversations and delete it if we do not begin working together, unless law requires otherwise.

status.success: Thank you. We’ll reply within a few UK working days.
status.error: Something went wrong. Please try again or email contact@sustainsage.com.
status.errorRequired: Please complete the required fields and confirm consent.

nextSteps.title: After you send this
items: We confirm receipt and share a booking link for a 20-minute intro call.
During the call we clarify expectations, boundaries, fees, and language preferences.
You decide calmly whether to start coaching, pause, or seek other support.

consent.label: Consent & confidentiality
points: Your details are used only to contact you about coaching.
Coaching is not therapy, counselling, medical, legal, immigration, or financial advice.
We follow the ICF Code of Ethics; confidentiality is broken only if law or safeguarding requires it.

faq.title: Questions we hear often
faq.intro: If your question is not covered here, feel free to mention it in your message.

items.question: Is the intro call free?
items.answer: Yes. It is a complimentary space to explore fit. There is no obligation to book further sessions.

items.question: What if I am unsure about coaching?
items.answer: You are welcome to start with questions only. We can share resources or suggestions even if you decide not to book.

items.question: How quickly will you reply?
items.answer: We aim to respond within a few UK working days. If we are on leave, an autoresponder will let you know.

items.question: What if I am in crisis?
items.answer: Coaching cannot meet urgent or acute mental health needs. Please contact NHS 111, Samaritans (116 123), or your local emergency services for immediate support.

icfSummary.title: Our ethical promise
icfSummary.intro: Coaching with SustainSage is collaborative, consent-led, and bounded. Here is what that means for you:
points: We co-create goals and pace; you can pause, slow, or stop at any point.
We signpost therapy, legal, immigration, or financial professionals when their expertise is required.
We honour confidentiality and the ICF Code of Ethics, breaking secrecy only when safety or law compels us.

sidebar.title: How we hold your message
sidebar.description: A coach — not an assistant — reads your note and responds personally.
sidebar.responseCopy: We aim to reply within a few UK working days. If we are away, an autoresponder lets you know.
sidebar.privacyCopy: Information is stored securely and deleted if we do not start working together, unless law requires otherwise.
sidebar.nextCopy: We confirm goals, boundaries, and logistics together so you decide whether coaching is the right support.
